input.sentences: [female] went shopping for furniture for her new offuce
first she picked out a desk .
then she went through the wide selection of chairs | testing them out until she found one she liked .
she browsed the vertical filing cabinets .
she decided she only needed two smaller | regular filing cabinets .
output.sentences: Yesterday, we went shopping for office furniture.
After searching, we picked out a new desk.
We had searched stores far and wide and tested many items before we made we selection.
We were also looking for vertical filing cabinets.
It turns out regular filing cabinets were more useful, we decided.
